thread.title: BUNNIES ON ICE

title: BUNNIES ON ICE
text:
Only registered TrekEarth members may write critiques. Photographer's Note 
My town suffered big damages in 1959 after a terrible hail storm, most of roofs and plantations were destroyed and people were obligated to stay under tables and many domestic animals died. Hail storms are part of the climatic events, in a rural region like mine it is ever a real danger. Few days ago my town was hit by a big storm that brought us many damages. Anyway this image was took almost one year ago in my backyard. You can see the lawn with the balls of ice, not so big fortunately, and some leaves of my persimmon tree hit by them. Minha cidade foi severamente atingida por uma tempestade de granizo em 1959, a maior parte das plantações e telhados foram destruídos e as pessoas tiveram, que se abrigar debaixo de mesas enquanto muitos animais domésticos morreram. Esta semana passamos por uma terrível tempestade que nos trouxe muitos danos. Felizmente o granizo não chegou a cair com força. Esta foto foi tirada há quase um ano, mostra o gramado dos fundos de minha casa e as folhas do caquizeiro arrancadas pelas pequenas pedras de gelo. 
Nobody has marked this note useful lousat (83708) 2015-10-14 2:01 
Hi Jorge,interesting capture of these big ice balls,fortunately we haven't something like that in this hot summer,but it happens a terrific tornado in 1984 like in your village in 1959.An original capture with the bunnies to give a special touch of this weather post,i like it! Have a nice day and thanks,Luciano Photo Information
